name: Chest hunter
description:
Try to find all chests on maps and don`t die. Then find blue portal to complete level. Also you can find keys from different doors. When you get how to play, try to build your own map for the game(your maps will appear in custom section).

 Android version will be soon!!!

Controls: W, A, D and Z for action, ESC in menu menu or game to go back, ENTER to save your map in map editor, mouse left/right(scroll map in editor) click and wheel(scale view in editor)
